title: Behavior Analysis-Based Computer Education Design: Intermediate Language Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Computer Literacy and Elementary-Level Language Proficiency
context.additional_context: Need to establish a personalized computer-based learning environment and formative assessment system aligned with individual learning paces.

learning_goals: Learners can complete computer-based tasks with 80% accuracy based on behavior analysis principles
Learners can perform self-corrections in at least three out of four attempts using computer-based feedback systems in language domains
Learners can reduce individual learning gaps by 50% within two weeks by analyzing formative assessment data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
